meanings.definition: Not blessed or favored by fortune; unfortunate.
meanings.sent1: The unblest child had to face many challenges in life.
meanings.sent2: She felt unblest as she watched others receive good news.
meanings.sent3: The unblest puppy kept getting into mischief, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unblest flower struggled to bloom in the harsh weather.
meanings.sent5: The unblest student worked hard to overcome obstacles and succeed.

meanings.definition: Not made holy or consecrated; not sanctified.
meanings.sent1: The unblest water was not suitable for the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The unblest ground was avoided for the sacred ritual.
meanings.sent3: The unblest candle refused to stay lit during the prayer service.
meanings.sent4: The unblest church stood abandoned, devoid of any spiritual presence.
meanings.sent5: The unblest relic was kept hidden away, away from the sacred artifacts.
